prompt: A stunning underwater scene showcasing a legendary sunken trident encrusted with ancient, glowing runes. The trident is partially buried in sand at the base of an enormous, colorful coral formation. Exotic marine creatures, including a giant octopus and shimmering schools of fish, swim gracefully around the artifact. Sunlight filters through the water, casting an ethereal glow over the entire scene. The surrounding corals and anemones add vibrant splashes of color, creating a mesmerizing and mystical underwater tableau. Full art image, no text.
